title: EU bans the destruction of unsold apparel, clothing, accessories and footwear
author: giuliomagnifico
aiHeadline: EU finally realizes destroying unsold clothes is wasteful, so they're banning it—because clearly, the solution is to make more clothes no one wants to buy.

title: Amazon's Ring and Google's Nest reveal the severity of U.S. surveillance state
author: mikece
aiHeadline: Amazon's Ring and Google's Nest are here to prove that your home is now a surveillance state, and you're just too lazy to notice.

title: I fixed Windows native development
author: deevus
aiHeadline: Windows native development is 'fixed'—finally, after all these years, someone figured out how to make it slightly less terrible.

title: I’m joining OpenAI
author: mfiguiere
aiHeadline: I'm joining OpenAI—because who wouldn't want to be part of an organization that's already revolutionized the world of text generation, and also, you know, maybe accidentally end humanity.

title: Oat – Ultra-lightweight, zero dependency, semantic HTML, CSS, JS UI library
author: twapi
aiHeadline: Introducing Oat: the ultra-lightweight, zero-dependency UI library that will finally solve all your problems—unless you're one of those people who actually need dependencies, in which case, good luck.
